segments.text: I see the open window, and the serene garden beyond, a stark contrast to our brewing storm inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy plants seem to mock the chaos, the water splattering and pooling beneath the woman’s feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she ever thinks about the outside world while lost in her kitchen chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children’s laughter echoes, weaving through the mundane sounds of dishwashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy reaching higher, his tiny body straining against gravity for just one cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a beautiful disaster it all is, filled with both danger and delight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think these moments will be all they remember, even if they come with a price.
segments.speaker: PAR
